Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Stub

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Stub
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerRemote, Serializable, Remote
public class Stub extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerRemote
The Stub class implements the ServerRemote interface for handling RMI communication with clients. It manages client callbacks, message reception, and heartbeat monitoring.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • receive

      public void receive(String uuid, Message m) throws RemoteException
      Receives a message from a client identified by UUID and processes it using ServerMessageHandler.
      Specified by:
      receive in interface ServerRemote
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier of the client
      m - the Message object received from the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an RMI-related exception or if the client is not found

    • setCallback

      public String setCallback(ClientRemote c)
      Sets the callback interface for a new client connection and returns the assigned UUID.
      Specified by:
      setCallback in interface ServerRemote
      Parameters:
      c - the ClientRemote object representing the callback interface for the client
      Returns:
      the UUID assigned to the client

    • heartbeat

      public void heartbeat(String uuid) throws RemoteException
      Sends a heartbeat signal to indicate that the client identified by UUID is still connected.
      Specified by:
      heartbeat in interface ServerRemote
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique identifier of the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is an RMI-related exception or if the client is not found

    • findDisconnectedClients

      public void findDisconnectedClients()
      Monitors and handles disconnections of clients based on heartbeat timeouts. Runs in a loop until stopped.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops the disconnection monitoring loop.
